abstract: Bill Simon, the chief operating officer, was promoted in a unit with a year-long slump in sales.
snippet: Bill Simon, the chief operating officer, was promoted in a unit with a year-long slump in sales.
lead_paragraph: Eduardo Castro-Wright, who was once seen as a candidate for chief executive of Wal-Mart Stores Inc., has been replaced as head of Wal-Mart’s United States operations.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Names Executive to Head U.S. Operation
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Names New Chief For Lagging U.S. Operations
